title: Numbers v1.6.1
description:
Numbers is the most innovative spreadsheet app ever designed for a mobile device. Built from the ground up for iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch, it lets you make compelling spreadsheets in minutes Ã¢â‚¬â€ with tables, charts, photos, and graphics Ã¢â‚¬â€ using just your fingers. Choose from over 250 easy-to-use functions. Enter data and explore results with sliders, steppers, pop-ups, and intelligent keyboards. Numbers works with iCloud, so your spreadsheets stay up to date across all your devices Ã¢â‚¬â€ automatically. And the Retina display on the new iPad makes everything you do in Numbers even more brilliant.

 Get started quickly
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Choose from 16 Apple-designed templates including Budget, Travel Planner, and Running Log
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ View and edit Numbers Ã¢â‚¬Ëœ09, Microsoft Excel, and CSV files; easily import files from Mail, the web, a WebDAV service, or your Mac or PC using iTunes File Sharing
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use iCloud to start editing your spreadsheet right where you left off on another device  
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Drag Excel, or CSV files to icloud.com on your PC to have them automatically appear on your devices

 Edit and format data
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Organize your data with great-looking tables and charts
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use an intelligent keyboard designed to enter numbers, dates, text, durations, or formulas
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Assemble formulas with over 250 functions, including built-in help
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create a form from any table with headers to quickly enter data on the go
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use sliders, steppers, and pop-ups to easily enter data and explore results 
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly add photos and videos from the Photos app using the Media Browser
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatically save your spreadsheets as you make changes 
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use the undo feature to go back through your previous changes Ã¢â‚¬â€ even the next time you open your spreadsheet

 Share your work
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Share your work by exporting it as a Numbers Ã¢â‚¬â„¢09, Microsoft Excel, or PDF file and sending it via Mail
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adjust how a sheet prints across multiple pages in Print Preview; you can also use Auto Fit
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Print your spreadsheets on a wireless printer on your network using AirPrint
 Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Copy spreadsheets to a WebDAV service or directly to your Mac or PC using iTunes File Sharing 
What's new in Version 1.6.1
 Numbers 1.6.1 works with iCloud to make spreadsheets automatically available between your iOS device and Numbers on your Mac*. Changes made to a spreadsheet on one device are instantly available on the other.
